home.title: Facility Finder · Home
home.lead: Search facilities within a radius on the map. Currently supports:
map.title: Facility Finder · Map
map.radius.help: Use the slider or input to adjust the search radius (50–2000m).
map.place.label: Enter a place/landmark; suggestions will appear shortly.
map.place.placeholder: e.g. Zhongxiao Fuxing, Taipei Main Station
map.status.overpassFail: Overpass API failed or timed out. Please try again later.
about.title: Facility Finder · About
about.body1: This tool is based on OpenStreetMap (OSM) open data and queries Overpass API in real time to search around your chosen center and radius.
about.body2: Because the data is community-edited, corrections on OSM usually appear here within minutes to hours.
about.body3: We do not store personal data; your browser’s Geolocation API is used only with your consent for quick positioning.

legal.li2: Query service: Overpass API with rate limits; if a server temporarily fails, the site retries via mirror endpoints.
legal.li3: Results are for reference only; accuracy and timeliness are not guaranteed.
